en_text: 2x ATK and reduce damage taken by 50% when matching 5 Heal orbs in a cross formation

jp_skill.name: もう打たせやしないよ…
jp_skill.raw_description: 回復の5個十字消しでダメージを半減、攻撃力が2倍。

kr_skill.name: I'm not letting you hit this ball anymore!
kr_skill.raw_description: 2x ATK & halves damage with a cross of 5 Heal Orbs

na_skill.name: I'm not letting you hit this ball anymore!
na_skill.raw_description: 2x ATK & halves damage with a cross of 5 Heal Orbs
